author: chroniclelive.co.uk
title: Business Supplement: Annual Construction Report
text:
Business Supplement: Annual Construction Report 14:51, 27 Sep 2016 14:53, 27 Sep 2016 By chroniclelive.co.uk The sector continues to explore ways to address issues that negatively impact on the future of the UK construction industry Share Get daily news by email 
2016 has seen a number of factors that have impacted on the UK's Construction Sector including the Government Construction Strategy Review, Brexit and the continued move to more Digital Construction. 
The sector continues to explore ways to address issues that negatively impact on the future of the UK construction industry, whilst focusing on three intrinsically linked key themes: Productivity, Skills and Image. 
Click on the pages above to read the supplement in full, or CLICK HERE , to open in a new window.
